fileSamples.statement:
(m1 e1 m2 e2 : Z) : snd
  (if (e1 <=? e2)%Z
   then (m1, (m2 * beta ^ (e2 - e1))%Z, e1)
   else ((m1 * beta ^ (e1 - e2))%Z, m2, e2)) = Z.min e1 e2.
fileSamples.conclusion:
snd
  (if (e1 <=? e2)%Z
   then (m1, (m2 * beta ^ (e2 - e1))%Z, e1)
   else ((m1 * beta ^ (e1 - e2))%Z, m2, e2)) = Z.min e1 e2
fileSamples.proofString:
generalize (Zle_cases e1 e2);case (Zle_bool e1 e2); intros He.
case (Zmin_spec e1 e2); intros (H1,H2); easy.
case (Zmin_spec e1 e2); intros (H1,H2); easy.

fileSamples.statement: (m1 e1 m2 e2 : Z) (He : (e1 <= e2)%Z) : snd (m1, (m2 * beta ^ (e2 - e1))%Z, e1) = Z.min e1 e2.
fileSamples.conclusion: snd (m1, (m2 * beta ^ (e2 - e1))%Z, e1) = Z.min e1 e2

fileSamples.statement: (m1 e1 m2 e2 : Z) (He : (e1 > e2)%Z) : snd ((m1 * beta ^ (e1 - e2))%Z, m2, e2) = Z.min e1 e2.
fileSamples.conclusion: snd ((m1 * beta ^ (e1 - e2))%Z, m2, e2) = Z.min e1 e2

fileSamples.statement: (f1 f2 : float beta) : F2R (Fplus f1 f2) = (F2R f1 + F2R f2)%R.
fileSamples.conclusion: F2R (Fplus f1 f2) = (F2R f1 + F2R f2)%R
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold Fplus.
generalize (Falign_spec f1 f2).
destruct (Falign f1 f2) as ((m1, m2), e).
intros (H1, H2).
rewrite H1, H2.
unfold F2R.
simpl.
rewrite plus_IZR.
apply Rmult_plus_distr_r.

fileSamples.statement:
(m1 m2 e : Z) : Fplus {| Fnum := m1; Fexp := e |} {| Fnum := m2; Fexp := e |} =
{| Fnum := m1 + m2; Fexp := e |}.
fileSamples.conclusion:
Fplus {| Fnum := m1; Fexp := e |} {| Fnum := m2; Fexp := e |} =
{| Fnum := m1 + m2; Fexp := e |}
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold Fplus.
simpl.
now rewrite Zle_bool_refl, Zminus_diag, Zmult_1_r.

fileSamples.statement: (f1 f2 : float beta) : Fexp (Fplus f1 f2) = Z.min (Fexp f1) (Fexp f2).
fileSamples.conclusion: Fexp (Fplus f1 f2) = Z.min (Fexp f1) (Fexp f2)
fileSamples.proofString:
unfold Fplus.
rewrite <- Falign_spec_exp.
now destruct (Falign f1 f2) as ((p,q),e).

fileSamples.statement: (f1 f2 : float beta) : F2R (Fplus f1 (Fopp f2)) = (F2R f1 - F2R f2)%R.
fileSamples.conclusion: F2R (Fplus f1 (Fopp f2)) = (F2R f1 - F2R f2)%R

fileSamples.statement: (f1 f2 : float beta) : (F2R f1 + - F2R f2)%R = (F2R f1 - F2R f2)%R.
fileSamples.conclusion: (F2R f1 + - F2R f2)%R = (F2R f1 - F2R f2)%R

fileSamples.statement:
(m1 m2 e : Z) : Fminus {| Fnum := m1; Fexp := e |} {| Fnum := m2; Fexp := e |} =
{| Fnum := m1 - m2; Fexp := e |}.
fileSamples.conclusion:
Fminus {| Fnum := m1; Fexp := e |} {| Fnum := m2; Fexp := e |} =
{| Fnum := m1 - m2; Fexp := e |}

fileSamples.statement:
(m1 m2 e : Z) : Fplus {| Fnum := m1; Fexp := e |} (Fopp {| Fnum := m2; Fexp := e |}) =
{| Fnum := m1 - m2; Fexp := e |}.
fileSamples.conclusion:
Fplus {| Fnum := m1; Fexp := e |} (Fopp {| Fnum := m2; Fexp := e |}) =
{| Fnum := m1 - m2; Fexp := e |}

fileSamples.statement:
(m1 e1 m2 e2 : Z) : (IZR (m1 * m2) * bpow (e1 + e2))%R =
(IZR m1 * bpow e1 * (IZR m2 * bpow e2))%R.
fileSamples.conclusion:
(IZR (m1 * m2) * bpow (e1 + e2))%R =
(IZR m1 * bpow e1 * (IZR m2 * bpow e2))%R

fileSamples.statement:
(m1 e1 m2 e2 : Z) : (IZR m1 * IZR m2 * (bpow e1 * bpow e2))%R =
(IZR m1 * bpow e1 * (IZR m2 * bpow e2))%R.
fileSamples.conclusion:
(IZR m1 * IZR m2 * (bpow e1 * bpow e2))%R =
(IZR m1 * bpow e1 * (IZR m2 * bpow e2))%R
